subject: SSN3794 - shipment problem
description_text:
Dear
The tracking shows shipments returned to sender!

Why??

conversations.body_text: Hi Ibrahim Albrahim,  We apologize for the inconvenience. The logistics provider reports that they cannot handle the hydraulic rods. We will send them to you through another channel.

Thank you for the update, I'm looking forward to try it. I hope it won't
Delay further and I hope you will include a compensation gift.

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025, 2:15â€¯PM support@simsonn.com

Could you please share the tracking number? When the delivery is
expected to arrive?

Dear,
I have received the shipment today, unfortunately the box wan not in a good
condition and it is missing the power supply cable!

Regards
Ibrahim
